backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining domain types for trading data, settings, and access control with authorization mixin setup.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI overlay, theme fixes, and affected frontend files with test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting up PWA metadata, theme color, and mounting the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, icons, theme colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing static asset caching, old cache cleanup, and network-first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling theme provider, header, dashboard, footer, crypto alert system, and toast notifications.
AI advisory badge component generating bullish/bearish/neutral signals based on indicators with tooltip display.
Generates AI-based crypto forecasts with sensitivity controls, accuracy display, and symbol selection tied to external coin selection.
frontend/src/components/AIInsightPanel.t: Computes and displays market-wide sentiment and technical insights based on EMA signals and RSI data.
frontend/src/components/AIOptimizerPanel: Shows AI optimization metrics, accuracy, and learning insights using results from the optimizer engine.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistoryPane: Loads, filters, searches, displays, and exports historical alert events with multiple filter options.
frontend/src/components/AlertOnboardingD: Guides users through enabling alert notifications with step-based onboarding and browser permission handling.
frontend/src/components/AlertSettingsPan: Provides UI for configuring alert preferences, handling notification permissions, and saving user settings with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/AlertToast.tsx: Displays animated toast alerts for trade signals with auto-dismiss, navigation handling, and styling based on alert type.
frontend/src/components/BacktestingPanel: Runs strategy backtests using sparkline-derived historical data and shows selectable strategies with performance metrics and charts.
frontend/src/components/CoinChart.tsx: Renders interactive crypto charts with EMA/RSI calculations, tooltips, and multiple view modes using fetched history data.
frontend/src/components/CoinDetailDialog: Shows a detailed modal with market data, charts, AI forecasts, and trade zone insights for a selected coin.
frontend/src/components/CorrelationHeatm: Renders a correlation heatmap for crypto assets, showing BTC metrics, divergences, and rotation signals using computed correlation matrices.
frontend/src/components/CryptoTable.tsx: Displays a sortable, searchable paginated crypto table with entry/exit zone indicators and optional selection handling.
frontend/src/components/DominanceMetrics: Shows BTC, ETH, USDT dominance and Total 3 market cap in a styled metrics panel.
frontend/src/components/FilterControls.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/ForecastAccuracy: Loads historical forecast data, computes accuracy, and renders a chart comparing predicted vs actual values with accuracy badges.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSensitiv: Provides UI radio controls for selecting forecast sensitivity modes with descriptive labels.
frontend/src/components/ForecastVerifica: Displays AI forecast accuracy, loads verification data, and visualizes recent prediction vs actual changes with charts and summary stats.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, theme toggle, and tracked-coins manager.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceAnaly: Shows trading performance metrics using mock data, with charts, tabs, and refresh/export actions.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceModeT: Provides a toggle for enabling performance mode and displays active optimizations when enabled.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioSimulat: Manages simulated portfolio positions, allowing opening, closing, updating, and resetting positions with calculated metrics.
Computes and displays top profit opportunities with success probabilities and ROI-based zone details.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallHelp.t: React component that detects platform and standalone mode to show platform-specific PWA installation instructions.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToDump.tsx: Analyzes crypto data to score dump potential and displays top bearish candidates with commentary and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToPump.tsx: Calculates pump potential scores for cryptocurrencies and shows top bullish candidates with generated commentary.
frontend/src/components/RiskManagementPa: Displays portfolio risk metrics and allows configuration of risk parameters using saved settings and live crypto data.
frontend/src/components/SensitivityContr: Manages and displays trade sensitivity settings with sliders, presets, stats calculation, and persistence.
frontend/src/components/SettingsControlC: Complex settings panel that loads, edits, saves, and resets user preferences with collapsible sections and React Query.
frontend/src/components/SignalPerformanc: Computes and displays performance metrics for EMA and RSI-based signals, with selectable categories and detailed coin dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StrategyCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button that switches between light and dark modes using next-themes after mount.
frontend/src/components/TopSignals.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Total3Chart.tsx: Visualizes BTC, ETH, and Total 3 market cap dominance using percentage bars and a detailed breakdown card.
frontend/src/components/TrackedCoinsMana: Manages user-selected tracked coins with localStorage persistence, search, and initialization from top market‑cap coins.
frontend/src/components/TradeEntryZonePa: Displays active and projected trade entry/exit zones with filtering, dialogs, and sparkline-derived projections.
frontend/src/components/TradeJournalAnal: Renders a dashboard showing trade journal analytics, syncing closed positions and displaying key metrics and charts.
frontend/src/components/WhaleTrackerPane: Analyzes price sparklines to detect whale movements and displays top activity with accumulation or distribution indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertSystem.ts: Monitors entry and exit signals and triggers alerts based on user preferences, avoiding duplicates via signal tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, loading, and persistence through a context-backed authentication provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for crypto data, positions, strategies, and mutations using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers, defines OKLCH theme variables for light/dark mode, and applies consistent styling for Radix UI overlays.
frontend/src/lib/aiOptimizer.ts: Tracks AI signal outcomes, computes performance metrics, and manages adaptive threshold adjustments using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/alertSystem.ts: Handles alert preferences, history, and notification behavior with localStorage persistence and cooldown logic.
frontend/src/lib/backtesting.ts: Implements historical strategy backtesting, tracks trades and equity, and saves summarized results to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/binanceApi.ts: Empty placeholder file for Binance API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinCapApi.ts: Empty placeholder file for CoinCap API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinGeckoApi.ts: Empty placeholder file for CoinGecko API integration.
frontend/src/lib/coinRankingApi.ts: Defines CoinRanking data models and fetches coin, historical, and dominance data with caching and batch API requests.
frontend/src/lib/correlationAnalysis.ts: Computes Pearson correlations between BTC and altcoins, detects divergence/convergence, and generates rotation signals.
frontend/src/lib/forecastEngine.ts: Generates short‑term crypto forecasts using indicators like RSI, EMA, MACD, and momentum with adjustable sensitivity modes.
frontend/src/lib/performanceMode.ts: Manages performance mode settings, toggling caching, polling, animations, and chart simplification via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioSimulation.ts: Implements virtual trading with position tracking, capital management, and PnL calculations using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profitZones.ts: Calculates support/resistance zones, ROI probabilities, expected profit ranges, and risk‑reward metrics for a crypto asset.
frontend/src/lib/riskManagement.ts: Provides risk parameter storage and computes support/resistance, ATR, stop loss, take profit, and position sizing recommendations.
frontend/src/lib/sensitivityControl.ts: Manages sensitivity settings, thresholds, and filtering logic for trade opportunities with utilities for modes and statistics.
frontend/src/lib/technicalIndicators.ts: Empty placeholder file for technical indicator utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tradeEntryZone.ts: Defines trade signal types and zone logic, including indicators, history storage, consecutive validation, and MACD calculations.
frontend/src/lib/tradeJournalAnalytics.t: Handles storage, creation, syncing, and analytics of trade journal entries and outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for class merging and formatting currencies, percentages, and large numbers.
frontend/src/lib/whaleTracker.ts: Detects and analyzes whale movements using volume and price data, storing recent activity and computing net flow scores.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard that fetches crypto data, applies filters, displays analysis panels, and manages coin selection UI state.
frontend/src/pages/StrategyLibrary.tsx: Empty page placeholder for strategy library.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to extract URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, radius, spacing, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state and features for a React/TypeScript crypto dashboard, including market data, charts, indicators, and trading intelligence modules.
